meanings.definition: Resembling a kilt in style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her kiltlike skirt swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The plaid fabric gave the dress a kiltlike look.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his kiltlike apron made him feel like a Scottish chef.
meanings.sent4: The rows of pleats created a kiltlike effect on the curtains.
meanings.sent5: The kiltlike design added a touch of tradition to the outfit.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a kilt.
meanings.sent1: The kiltlike pattern on the socks matched his outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She admired the kiltlike details on the jacket.
meanings.sent3: The kiltlike hat made him look like a stylish Scotsman.
meanings.sent4: The kiltlike material was soft and comfortable to wear.
meanings.sent5: The kiltlike fringe added a unique touch to the scarf.
